#### LINKAGES

##### R Installation 
```r
# Public
echo 'devtools::install_github("araiho/linkages_package")' | R --vanilla
```

##### FORTRAN VERSION

```r
#FORTRAN VERSION
cd
git clone https://github.com/araiho/Linkages.git
cd Linkages
gfortran -o linkages linkages.f
sudo cp linkages /usr/local/bin/linkages.git
```
